titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Medicare program for FDA-approved qualifying colorectal cancer screening blood-based tests, to increase participation in colorectal cancer screening in under-screened communities of color, to offset the COVID-19 pandemic driven declines in colorectal cancer screening, and for other purposes.
Donald Payne, Sr., Colorectal Cancer Detection Act of 2021
Donald Payne, Sr., Colorectal Cancer Detection Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Donald Payne Sr. Colorectal Cancer Detection Act of 2021
This bill provides for Medicare coverage and payment, subject to specified frequency limits, of certain colorectal cancer screening blood-based tests.
